snippet: A professional matador was killed in the ring in front of spectators, and another man died in a local bull run. Two other men were gored at a popular festival in Pamplona....

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER MELE and SANDRA E. GARCIA

lead_paragraph: A professional matador was killed in the ring in front of spectators, and another man died in a local bull run. Two other men were gored at a popular festival in Pamplona.

headline.main: 2 Are Killed by Bulls in Spain
